channel.title: Portforwarding help? :(
channel.description:
Okay, before i start i just want to say, [b]PLEASE DONT FLAME ME, I JUST NEED A BIT OF SIMPLE HELP![/b]
I need to portforward for my rsps, but i can't figure out how to do a couple things. I'm folowing the portforward.com tut. I've made my static ip adress, and entered it in the area it told me too. Then, when i open up my web browser and type my static ip, it just says "the page cannot be displayed" I tried using the default one too and it didnt work.
If you can help, [b]PLEASE[/b] do! [i]BTW it's a linksys router[/i]

item.title: Portforwarding help? :(
item.dc:creator: @Master_Chef Master Chef
item.description:
@Master_Chef wrote:

The most easiest way is to portfoward with uTorrent. I’ll make a tutorial in a reply

Ok first Download uTorrent.
Next press the Preferences button and then press the Connections tab. Change the port to 43594 and apply and press OK.
Afterwards, close uTorrent and run your server. Start up uTorrent and then your server is online.

Oh and if my tutorial doesn’t work for you try this:
Username: (none)
Password: admin

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding help? :(
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“Efilite, post:10, topic:276507”][quote author=time of rune link=topic=365138.msg2770718#msg2770718 date=1241115663]

uhm www.portforward.com , this always works u even have guide’s goodluck .

read my post… I am using it…
And btw, I DONT NEED MY DEFAULT GATEWAY! I ALREADY KNOW WHAT IT IS, IT JUST WONT LET ME ACCESS MY ROUTER SETTINGS!

GIVE UP 10 SECONDS OF YOUR LIFE TO READ THE WHOLE POST!
[/quote]
Calm down, or no one will help you, if you already have your default gateway, just type it into the web browser by default the username is admin and the password is password. If you, your parents/guardians have changed it.[/quote]
The problem is, that when i type the default gateway, it wont do anything. It just says “Cannot connect to the page”…

Read full topic

GIVE UP 10 SECONDS OF YOUR LIFE TO READ THE WHOLE POST![/quote]
Calm down, or no one will help you, if you already have your default gateway, just type it into the web browser by default the username is admin and the password is password. If you, your parents/guardians have changed it.

Read full topic

time of rune:

ty, if i can get it 2 work, rep++ :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2009, 06:37:15 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post, but the soul’s tut didnt help ANY

Linksys… That’s all I read. Did you do: Gaming and Applications > port 43594 to 43594 > both protocals > the extension to your computer (i.e. 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.1.4) ?
